scripts.build: browserify --debug public/js/index.jsx > public/js/index.js; browserify --debug public/js/order/PreviewOrder.jsx > public/js/order/PreviewOrder.js; browserify --debug public/js/order/PreviewAllOrders.jsx > public/js/order/PreviewAllOrders.js; browserify --debug public/js/budget/DrawIncomeAndOutgoGraph.jsx > public/js/budget/DrawIncomeAndOutgoGraph.js; browserify --debug public/js/cost/PreviewCostApplication.jsx > public/js/cost/PreviewCostApplication.js
scripts.build-dist: NODE_ENV=production browserify public/js/index.jsx | uglifyjs -m > public/js/index.js; NODE_ENV=production browserify public/js/order/PreviewOrder.jsx | uglifyjs -m > public/js/order/PreviewOrder.js; NODE_ENV=production browserify public/js/order/PreviewAllOrders.jsx | uglifyjs -m > public/js/order/PreviewAllOrders.js; NODE_ENV=production browserify public/js/budget/DrawIncomeAndOutgoGraph.jsx | uglifyjs -m > public/js/budget/DrawIncomeAndOutgoGraph.js; NODE_ENV=production browserify public/js/cost/PreviewCostApplication.jsx | uglifyjs -m > public/js/cost/PreviewCostApplication.js
